title: bajarE re chitta
language:
Pallavi 







bhajare re re citta bAlAmbikAM bhakta



kalpalatikAM tAM







anu
sahitya:
nijarUpa dAna dakshhacaraNAM aruNAM



nityAkalyANIM sharvANIM



(bhajarE)







caraNam







shrI vAgbhava kUTa jAta catur-veda-svarUpiNIM



shrngAra kAmarAjodbhava sakala vishva vyApiNIM



devIM shaktibIjodbhava mAtrkArNa sharIriNIM



devanuta bhava roga hara vaidyapati hrdaya vihAriNIM







bhAva rAga tALa modinIM bhaktAbhIshhTa pradAyinIM



sevaka jana pAlana guruguha rUpa muttu kumAra jananIM







(gaana)
